name: Little, Appellant, v. Four Wheel Drive Sales Company et al.

judges: Before Simpson, Kephart, Schaffer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
parties: Little, Appellant, v. Four Wheel Drive Sales Company et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Wiokersham.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Little, Appellant, v. Four Wheel Drive Sales Company et al.

Arthur H. Hull, of Snyder, Hull, Hull & Leiby, for appellee.
